question.questionText: Explain in one sentence what each graph tells you. Graph A) number of tree rings versus time.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: As time increases, the number of tree rings also increases.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The more tree rings the faster. The less, the slower.
This graph tells you how many tree rings grow on a tree in a certain amount of time.
This graph shows that the number of tree rings was increasing by a certain amount of time.
